summary: This house is a Work in Progress.  It's designed to be functional with massive amounts of storage space and scripts to automate retrieving and storing items.  It features an Alchemy Lab, Blacksmith, Kitchen, Study, Display Room, Master Bedroom, Training Room and more.
descriptionHtml:
*****************************************************************

TES: Skyrim
LFox Moon Sugar Manor v0.14
Made by LFox

*****************************************************************

1. INSTALLING THE PLUGIN

*****************************************************************

1. Extract the mod to the Data folder and enable it via the
launcher or mod manager.

*****************************************************************

2. Mod Load Order

*****************************************************************

This plugin should be fine anywhere in your load order.

*****************************************************************

3. Updating

*****************************************************************

Before updating to new versions please read through the version
notes to make sure no containers you are using have been
modified. This should not happen very often if at all.

When you update i recommend you have your character saved outside
the house. The reason being is a vast amount of objects that get
added have a script to disable havok physics such as the
ingredient jars, smithing material containers to prevent them
flying around or moving.

The script takes effect upon entering the cell and is not
triggered if you load a save where your already in the house.
To trigger it if you saved inside simply leave the house and
re-enter it.

*****************************************************************

4. Known Issues

*****************************************************************

Unfixable
*********
These bugs are unfixable unless someone can tell me otherwise
due to it being a problem with how the game engine handles things.

- Sometimes on entering the cell the mannequins will all appear
in the entry hall before being teleported back to their
locations.

- This only applies to saves using previous versions of this mod.
A handful of objects don't seem to update their location if
they are moved. Even if they are deleted and placed as a new
object. This is due to how the game engine handles objects.

This can be fixed by opening the console, selecting the object,
clicking on it and typing "resetreference". WARNING: THIS WILL
DELETE CONTAINERS CONTENTS.

*****************************************************************

5. Mod Description

*****************************************************************

NOTE: This mod is currently a work in progress. I'll try
to get it updated every so often. There is ALOT of work left to
do on it but it's actually gotten to the point where its usuable.
Lighting has not been done yet, Navmeshing to support NPCs has
been autogenerated so its not perfect. It also has not been
optimized yet to improve performance.

I designed this house mod for myself to cater to my needs for
housing including the needs i don't even have yet. This house
is not designed to just look pretty like most houses. It's
designed to look nice (hopefully), provide quick easy access
between important rooms and provide massive storage space
with quick sort features.

If you would like something changed or features implimented
let me know and i'll consider it. However first and foremost
this mod is for myself. I uploaded it so others could download
it if they so wish.

To access the house travel to falkreath. If you fast travel
the wall on your right hand side will have a barrel next to it.
This barrel will act as a door and allow you to enter the house.

Q. Is there any unsafe chests or containers that respawn?
A. No every single chest or container is set not to respawn.
Normal items like cupboards or wardrobes use a seperate id from
the defaults which does not contain trash items and does not
respawn.

Q. Why did you include such an overpowered merchant?
A. The merchant exists to provide easy access to goods, materials,
equipment to outfit companions and a easy way to offload items.
If you have a problem with that simply do not use the merchant
or do not make use of the aspects you consider cheaty. The
merchant will not be removed and will not be made more balanced
for gameplay.

Q. Will the house have a proper location in the game world?
A. Most likely, yes.

1st Floor
*********

Alchemy Lab
***********
The Alchemy lab houses the alchemy workbench as well as a
variety of tools to help with alchemy.

NOTE: The garden is only for display it will only respawn when
the cell resets. A script fills a chest with ingredients from the
garden daily for ease and to prevent the garden looking ugly.

- A pair of cabinets house the entire Standing Stone collection
in miniture form allowing you to pick a new star sign at any time.

- A small garden displays 32 different growable ingredients.
Instead of manually harvesting ingredients everyday 2 of each
type will be deposited in a nearby chest.

- Shelves hold ingredient containers for every single ingredient
in the game with 32 unused containers for misc usage.

- Shelves hold a multitude of potion shaped containers with
various names intended for easy potion/poison storage.

- The workbench has a recipe book on top which contains recipes
for high end potions and poisons.

- Activators on the workbench allow ingredients to be autosorted
to their appropriate containers or retrieved. Another activates
the Master Craftsman Buff.

Blacksmith
**********
The Blacksmith houses all the necessary tools to do armor and
weapon crafting. Such as the forge, smelter, tanning rack ect.

- Shelves hold containers for every smithing material in the
game with several unused containers for misc usage.

- Activators on a table allow materials and gems to be autosorted
to their appropriate containers or retrieved. Another activates
the Master Craftsman Buff.

- Five locks on a wooden beam automatically relock themselves
upon opening allowing you to practice lockpicking and advance
your skill.

Display Room
************
The Display Room houses it all chests, weapon racks, mannequins.
It's the center of the house and designed to be where everything
gets stored.

- Has a total of 16 mannequins ready to be outfitted.

- Has a total of 16 weapon rack slots for display.

- Has a total of 32 chests for storage.

- Has a total of 36 display cabinets with 36 cupboards underneath
for further storage.

- Has a total of 4 Shield/Weapon plaques for display.

Entry Hall
**********

- A shelf of Portal Stones provides instant travel to all the
major holds as well as the 4 major guilds. Guild Portal Stones
however will only function after doing the quests to unlock the
area they teleport you to.

- A small activator on the shelf allows for the Weightless buff
to be activated.

Kitchen
*******
The Kitchen houses all the necessary tools for cooking.

Store
*****
WARNING: There is a bug in the game engine when a vendor has
over approximately 30,000 gold it will glitch and stop functioning.
When it is glitched items you sell will not give you any income.
When the vendor resets the gold will reset and the glitch will
disappear.

The store is run by a female khajiit called Kisana who provides
the goods and services of an entire town. She has the resources
to help you outfit an army of companions, learn new spells or
practice crafting.

- She has 12,000 gold that refreshes regulary.

- She sells Armor, Arrows, Alchemy Ingredients, Drinks, Food,
Gems, Jewelry, Lockpicks, Potions, Scrolls, Smithing materials,
Soul Gems, Spellbooks and Weapons in bulk. She also sells a
teleport spell for Moon Sugar Manor and a few Misc items.

- A ledger on the desk allows you to buy a bulk delivery of
alchemy ingredients which costs 120,000 gold but adds 100
of every single ingredient to your alchemy containers.

- Activators on the counter allow purchased items to be autosorted
to their appropriate rooms/containers or retrieved instantly.

- A small activator on the counter allows for the Weightless buff
to be activated.

- A small container on the counter allows for storage of goods
you need to sell.

Study
*****
The Study houses all the necessary tools to enchant equipment and
store a large collection of books.

- A total of 32 bookshelves which allow 11 books each for a total
storage space of 352 books.

- Shelves hold containers for every Soul Gem with several unused
containers for misc usage.

- Activators on a enchanting table allow Soul Gems to be
autosorted to their appropriate containers or retrieved. Another
activates the Master Craftsman Buff.

2nd Floor
*********

Guest Rooms
***********
There are a total of 4 Guest Rooms each is designed to house
companions and provide storage for all the various items they are
required to wear or carry.

- Each room has a total of 8 Wardrobes so different armor sets can
be stored seperately.

- Each room has a total of 4 weapon rack slots for display.

- Each room has a shelf with 8 chests for misc storage.

Master Bedroom
**************
The Master Bedroom is the main bedroom designed for the player.
As such it houses a variety of storage containers.

- Has a total of 4 mannequins ready to be outfitted.

- Has a total of 4 weapon rack slots for display.

- A total of 16 wardrobes on either side of the bed allow for
many different sets of outfits to be stored seperately.

- A desk holds a pair of containers. A strong box designed to
store the evergrowing key collection and an income ledger to store
excess gold.

Training Room
*************
The Training Room is exactly as it sounds a room designed to allow
you to train your combat skills and gain skill points on training
dummies.

- Has 2 seperate training dummies that allow you to increase your
skills.

- A Torture set on the table allows you to collect blood once a day
from the training dummies which can be drunk to satisfy a vampires
thirst.

Special Features
****************
Below is a list of various features that deserve special
documentation.

Master Craftsman Buff
*********************
The Master Crastsman Buff is designed to remove the annoying
necessity to wear enchanted items and use potions to improve your
gear to the maximum level. It assumes that you have all the
necessary Enchanting and Alchemy perks to achieve that result.
Below is the list of the affects that will be applied for 10 minutes.

+30% to Enchanting (Acquired through an Alchemy Potion)
+100% to Alchemy (Acquired through Enchanting Gear)
+100% to Smithing (Acquired through Enchanting Gear)
+120% to Smithing (Acquired through an Alchemy Potion)

The effect can be activated via a scroll looking item found in
the Alchemy, Blacksmithing and Enchanting rooms.

Teleport Spell
**************
Moon Sugar Manor comes with its own unique teleport spell. Simply
buy the spell tome from Kisana for a small fee and then you can
freely teleport home from wherever you are. If you cast the
teleport spell while inside Moon Sugar Manor you'll be transported
back to where you were.

Weightless Buff
***************
The Weightless Buff is designed to allow you to cart around all
your various armor sets, materials and other items so you can
decorate your home. The buff will only work inside Moon Sugar Manor.

+10,000 Carry Weight for 30 Minutes.

*****************************************************************

6. Permissions

*****************************************************************
You are not allowed to use any part of this mod or its assets
in your own mod project or another without contacting me and
getting my written permission to do so.

Translating this mod into other languages does not require my
permission. You are free to do so providing you include all the
proper documentation of the readme and the credits.

*****************************************************************

7. Version History

*****************************************************************

v0.14
- Added the ability to harvest blood from the training dummies.
- Added the following DG items for sale Ammo, Blood Potions,
Ingredients, Weapons
- Added a display garden to the Alchemy Lab with auto growth
script so you don't need to make the garden ugly to get its
benefits.
- Added Portal stone for College of Winterhold and The Companions.
- The Dark Brotherhood Portal Stone will now switch between the
two sanctuaries depending on how far you are in the questline.

v0.13
- Kisana now buys stolen items as intended.
- Rebuilt the Blacksmith to a different tileset.
- Added 6 different arrow quiver chests to Blacksmith due to lack
of a better room to put them in.
- Added 4 Shield/Weapon plaques to the display room.
- Added 4 Guest Rooms.
- Made minor deco changes to some areas.

v0.12
- Added Training Room. TES fans should recognize the training
dummies.
- Added Portal Stones to Entry Hall.
- Added cooking station to kitchen which i forgot to add last
version.
- Teleport to Moon Sugar manor caused crashes when recalling to
a zone such as inside whiterun town. This should now be fixed.
I believe it has to do with how the engine handles interior/exterior
zones. Recalling with Teleport will now trigger two loading
screens. The reason is you will be teleported to the skyrim world
and then to your destination which should prevent crashes.
- Added Weightless buff item to Alchemy Lab and Blacksmith.

v0.11
- Removed 2 storage containers in the Blacksmith next to the
Gem Chest. Dragon Bones and Dragon Scales chests have been
placed there instead they have also been added to the autosorters.
- The Moon Sugar Manor Teleport spell now works as a Mark and
Recall Spell.
- Alchemy Shipment is now an activator on the shop counter instead
of an item sold by Kisana. The gold is now a fixed amount and
you cannot trade items back for it.
- Added Soul Gem auto sorting and several misc containers.
- Key storage chest and income ledger chest added to master bedroom.
- Pickaxe and Woodcutters axe added for sale.
- Gave Kisana a new vendor sale list which should fix the
inability to buy alot of items.
- Activatable Weightless buff added.
- Rebuilt the kitchen to a different tileset then started wondering
if i should have.
- Minor Decor changes to Master Bedroom.
- Minor Decor changes to Alchemy Lab.
- Music added, subject to change.
- Fixed borked ceiling, accidentally copied something?

v0.10
- Made the plugin

*****************************************************************

8. Credits

*****************************************************************

LFox (me) - For everything

UVXWarcat - House frame layout and help on figuring out some
furniture placement

pheo3309 - For his suggestions and helping test various things.

Special thanks to everyone for their nice comments and suggestions.

Darliandor's Alchemy Lab and UESPWiki websites - For the wealth
of alchemy information they have that helped me put together the
recipe book.
http://skyrim.melian.cc/
http://www.uesp.net
author: LFox
